summary:
Hello,

The F-Droid Board‚Äôs first effort to start an F-Droid Community Council ‚Äì an
important step toward ensuring a safe, constructive, and empowered community
‚Äì was not successful despite an excellent initial group of members and a
strong desire all around to see the effort succeed.   After reflection and
discussion, we have learned some lessons from this experience, including
about how to set up newly elected Council members for success.   With that in
mind, we are ready to open a new call for nominations for the Community
Council...
title: Call for Community Council Nominations

summary:
Brussels Sprouts Casserole
DisclaimerThis post contains a recipe that I did not create, the link to the original creator is under Post Info below.  No claim of ownership here, I simply love the recipe and riff on it frequently. 
Cook Time: 55 min  | Servings: 8
Ingredients:

  
    
    
      2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
    
  
  
    
    
      2 pounds Brussels sprouts, quartered at the root end (or halved if small)
    
  
  
    
    
      4 tablespoons unsalted butter
    
  
  
    
    
      2 leeks, white and light green parts, halved and sliced ¬º-inch-thick
    
  
  
    
    
      Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
    
  
  
    
    
      2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme
    
  
  
    
    
      3 cloves garlic, sliced
    
  
  
    
    
      3 tablespoons all-purpose flour
    
  
  
    
    
      2 cups low-sodium chicken stock
    
  
  
    
    
      1 cup heavy cream
    
  
  
    
    
      ¬º cup grated Parmesan
    
  
  
    
    
      2 teaspoons Dijon mustard
    
  
  
    
    
      Zest of 1 lemon
    
  
  
    
    
      2 cups crispy onions, such as French's
